description:
This dataproduct consists of a set of gridded map layers showing the average abundance of different species of species groups for different time windows (seasonal, annual or multi-annual as appropriate) using spatial modelling.
They cover a wide taxonomic range, from the smallest organisms (e.g. diatoms, flagellates) to the largest ones (e.g. fish, birds, reptiles, mammals), encompassing all trophic levels.
keywords: fish, bird, reptile, mammal, trophic level, grid, diatom, flagellate, dataproduct, average, abundance, time, season, year, Species distribution
name: EMODnet Gridded abundances of marine species (2 year average)
